text: int main ( ) { int n , c , g ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( int z = 0 ; z < n ; z ++ ) { int p , s = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & p ) ; int arr [ p ] ; for ( int i = 0 ; i < p ; i ++ ) { for ( int j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & c ) ; if ( j == 0 ) g = c ; if ( g <= c ) { g = c ; } } arr [ i ] = g ; } for ( int t = 0 ; t < p ; t ++ ) { } for ( int y = 0 ; y < p ; y ++ ) { s = s + arr [ y ] ; } s -- ; printf ( "%d\n" , s ) ; } }
